author: adammurdoch
msg: Detached VfsComponent from FileProvider, FileSystem, and FileReplicator.

author: adammurdoch
msg: Use the new Jar provider instead of the Zip provider for jar: URLs.

author: adammurdoch
msg: Added a Jar file provider.  Patch submitted by Brian Olsen.

author: adammurdoch
msg: Clean up provider lifecycle and logging:
- Moved lifecycle management methods from FileProvider, FileSystem, and
- Added VfsComponent.setLogger() to allow a logger to be supplied to a
component.  Still uses Commons-Logging's Log interface.
- Added DefaultFileSystemManager.setLogger(), sets the logger to be supplied
to the components that are added to the manager.  Defaults to the logger

author: adammurdoch
msg: Removed test properties so they can be defined in build.properties instead.
